Flying
[i]Bibliophile[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. You may pay {2}. If you do, return target spell to its owner's hand.
[i]Missiletainn[/i] – As long as Ophelia, Storm Sorceress is equipped, instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink and deathtouch.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{W}{U}{B}
